content.rendered:
[vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »grid » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » z_index= » » css= ».vc_custom_1513244757170{margin-top: 30px !important;} »][vc_column][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1512644354680{padding-top: 50px !important;} »]

Support us

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type= »small » position= »center » color= »#00a0e3″][vc_column_text]

Every child deserves a chance to succeed in life. With your support, Break Poverty Foundation can work towards making this happen. Join us!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »grid » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » padding_top= »90″ padding_bottom= »0″ z_index= » »][vc_column width= »1/2″][vc_column_text]

BECOME A SPONSOR / PARTNER

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type= »small » position= »left » color= »#00a0e3″ up= »8″ down= »20″][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1526547601437{padding-bottom: 10px !important;} »]At Break Poverty Foundation, sponsorship allows you to directly contribute to the fight against extreme poverty by supporting our programs. Close to a billion children live below the poverty line in the world, and this amounts to 1 in 5 children in France. Break Poverty Foundation expands the reach of innovative programs and research projects. You can support them by becoming a sponsor.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1512746439153{padding-top: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;} »]

Support the innovations of tomorrow to fight against poverty

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1512755887053{padding-bottom: 15px !important;} »]The fight against poverty has begun. Our teams are dedicated to identifying, developing and supporting innovative and impactful projects.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1524815634020{padding-bottom: 15px !important;} »]These projects would not come to fruition without the support of our sponsors.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1526547640703{padding-bottom: 15px !important;} »]You can either choose to directly support Break Poverty Foundation and we will allocate your aid to the programs we deem a priority.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Or you can choose to support the needs of the specific projects or research programs that you would like to help.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width= »1/2″][vc_single_image image= »26594″ img_size= »full » alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= »element_from_right » transition_delay= »0.4″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »grid » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » z_index= » » css= ».vc_custom_1513244788439{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;} »][vc_column][vc_zigzag color= »custom » custom_color= »#00a0e3″ css= ».vc_custom_1513244935984{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;} »][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1537187457942{padding-top: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;} »]

The different types of sponsorship

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type= »small » position= »center » color= »#00a0e3″ up= »10″ down= »40″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »grid » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » z_index= » » css= ».vc_custom_1513245083151{padding-top: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 90px !important;} »][vc_column width= »1/4″][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1537187526112{padding-bottom: 10px !important;} »]

Make a long-term commitment to the fight against poverty

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type= »small » position= »left » color= »#00a0e3″ up= »8″ down= »20″][vc_column_text]You wish to support a project over the span of 3 years? Much more than a spontaneous donation, this method creates a powerful connection and proximity with the actors and beneficiaries of the project that you will have chosen, directly linking you to its progression. A convention will be established between your company and Break Poverty Foundation.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width= »1/4″][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1537187536016{padding-bottom: 10px !important;} »]

The financial donation

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type= »small » position= »left » color= »#00a0e3″ up= »8″ down= »20″][vc_column_text]This is the quickest, simplest and most efficient method of supporting the actions led by Break Poverty Foundation.
If you wish, we can target your donation to a specific project that you are particularly enthusiastic about or we can simply use it to contribute to our programs depending on their level of priority.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width= »1/4″][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1537187543295{padding-bottom: 10px !important;} »]

Payroll Giving Scheme

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type= »small » position= »left » color= »#00a0e3″ up= »8″ down= »20″][vc_column_text]You can choose to implement a solidarity ’rounding’ option on salary for the employees in your company who would like to contribute in this manner. The extra cents donated would then be withdrawn from their monthly salary. It would also be possible for the rounded figure to be increased by the employee. The employer could also add to the contribution. Your company could in this way participate in the donation of each of your collaborators. A simple and collaborative way of fighting against poverty![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width= »1/4″][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1537187552445{padding-bottom: 10px !important;} »]

Skills sponsorship

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type= »small » position= »left » color= »#00a0e3″ up= »8″ down= »20″][vc_column_text]Upon agreement with the company, an employee can provide Break Poverty foundation with his or her skills free of charge, thereby contributing to a project of social utility. An interesting alternative for those who wish to fully implicate themselves in helping the most destitute.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »full_width » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » z_index= » »][vc_column]

For any additional information, please do not hesitate to contact us
Contact us
[vc_column_text]Crédits photos : Julian Scagliola, Michael Mims, Unsplash.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

With your support, Break Poverty Foundation can work towards making this happen. Join us! [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row…
